featured.text: Michael Phelps, an American swimmer, broke seven world records and won eight gold medals in men’s swimming _____ in the 2008 Olympics.
The women’s softball team that won gold for Japan at the Beijing Olympics is reported to have used blood-type theories to customize training for each player.

definition.zh_def: 奧林匹克運動會，國際體育競賽，每四年舉行一次，參賽國家和地區的運動員參加各種體育項目。
definition.en_def: The Olympics, an international sports competition held every four years, featuring athletes from various countries and regions competing in multiple sports.
definition.example: The Olympics bring together athletes from all over the world to compete for gold medals.
